column5: Has anyone bought and used any preserved minnows from Cabela's. I've always salted my own. Just curious. Thanks.

I leave for Lac Suel next Saturday and will be trying the Cabela's minnows I will report the results on this board. I heard they work ok. If they don't we will purchase live minnows daily. I have used salt borax mix to preserve my own but was to busy with graduations and wedding to get it done this year. MWal
I bought a couple bags from Cabelas then ran across this website www.bestbait.com They were about $.85 a bag for the larger ones. They worked great up in the Morson area.
